title: Semantic Kernel Template Error Fix
details:
## Issue Resolution: Semantic Kernel Template Error

Successfully fixed the "function identifier is empty" error in the AISummarizer. The issue was caused by malformed template variable substitution in the chunk summarization process.

### Root Cause:
The template replacement logic was not properly handling variable substitution, leading to empty or malformed template syntax when passed to Semantic Kernel.

### Solution Applied:
1. Enhanced variable validation in `ProcessVariableSubstitution` method
2. Added comprehensive error handling and debugging information
3. Improved template syntax validation before function creation
4. Added fallback mechanisms for template creation failures

### Test Results:
- Successfully processed 756MB video file (Operations Management Live Session 4.3)
- Generated 10 chunk summaries in parallel without errors
- Created comprehensive final summary (6,882 characters)
- All AI functions worked correctly
- Processing completed in ~58 seconds

### Files Modified:
- `src/c-sharp/NotebookAutomation.Core/Services/AISummarizer.cs`
- Enhanced error handling, variable validation, and debugging capabilities

The fix ensures robust template processing and prevents future Semantic Kernel function creation failures.
